data.title: Tesla Self-Driving Software Rewrite Should Be Available By End Of 2020: Musk
data.text: While it has been promised for a long time, Tesla Inc's (NASDAQ: TSLA) Full Self Driving software has yet to reach the goal of full autonomy.

data.title: Elon Musk Squashes Rumor About A Tesla Smartwatch
data.text: Earlier Monday morning, rumors came out that Tesla Inc. (NASDAQ: TSLA) was working with Huami Corporation (NYSE: HMI) on a Tesla-branded smartwatch.

data.title: Tesla Strikes Solar Roof Installation Partnerships
data.text: Tesla Inc (NASDAQ: TSLA) has been installing the company's solar roof product for over a year now, and ramping up installation speed and production during that time.

data.title: Why Tesla Stock Is Rocketing 8.5% Higher Today
data.text: A weekend report revives hopes for increased lithium demand.

data.title: Tesla shares jump 9% amid tech rebound, Goldman comments
data.text: Shares of Tesla moved higher on Monday, amid a broad rally in the technology sector.

data.title: Tesla Vs. Baidu: AI And Robotaxi
data.text: Tesla Vs. Baidu: AI And Robotaxi

data.title: Tesla investors should be watching for M&A for S&P inclusion
data.text: Tesla Inc investors were disappointed after the company was snubbed in the S&P 500's latest round of inclusions, but the electric automaker's entry could still happen at any time and a merger by others in the benchmark index might help.
